dashboard.label: Data Usage
dashboard.description: Dashboard to help see how much data is being used the past 7 days and to track how much each Forwarder is sending.

panel.title: Data Indexed in GB for Last 7 days.

search.query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log type="RolloverSummary" | eval _time=_time - 43200 | bin _time span=1d | eval GB=round(b/1024/1024/1024, 3) | stats sum(GB) by host _time | sort -_time

table.title: Last 24 hours per host - click on host name to see Source and Sourcetype information.

search.query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log | eval GB=b/1024/1024/1024 | stats sum(GB) by h | sort -sum(GB)

table.title: Source/Sourcetype volume by GB in descending order. Clicking in a row will launch a new search to investigate further.

search.query: index=_internal source=*license_usage.log h="$h$" | eval GB=b/1024/1024/1024 | stats sum(GB) as volume_in_GB by idx s st | sort - volume_in_GB | rename idx AS index s AS source st AS sourcetype
